title: Fat F1 drivers in 1995
summary: It’s an unfortunate fact that rather more Formula 1 drivers are better remembered for misfortunes than achievement. For me 30 years ago the Japanese hopeful Taki Inoue fitted this bill.…

qa_pairs.question: Which Japanese driver is often remembered for his misfortunes in Formula 1 during the 1990s?
In what year did Taki Inoue compete in Formula 1?
What is a common theme associated with various Formula 1 drivers from the 1990s?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Being better remembered for misfortunes than achievements
